name: Catch em! It's a fun free game!
name_original: Catch em! It's a fun free game!
description:
"Catch Em!" is a simple one game that is impossible to put down. Play this fun & addictive game and beat old your score.

How to play?
- Tap to fly to the top and avoid the spikes. The faster you tap, the quicker you flie. Collect precious gems on your way to unlock fantastic new characters!
- How fast are your reaction skills? This fun and fast paced arcade game will test you to the max.

Have fun!
